content: Add get_type() method to DiscoveryContext
Remove as_hashmap() method from DiscoveryContext
Run `cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt` and fix errors after removing as_hashmap()
Update LevelResult enum - change Continue variant from HashMap to String
Update engine.rs attempt_discovery_with_recovery to handle String Continue variant
Update Level 2 execute_level_2_direct_discovery to return String in Continue
Run `cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt` and fix errors after LevelResult changes
Add transformer registry singleton function to transformers.rs
Move execute_level_3_pattern_transformations from recovery_engine.rs to engine.rs
Update Level 3 implementation to use self.discovery_context.get_type() instead of HashMap
Move all helper functions from recovery_engine.rs to engine.rs as private methods
Update Level 3 to use transformer_registry() singleton instead of local creation
Remove recovery_engine.rs dependency from engine.rs
Delete recovery_engine.rs file completely
Run `cargo build && cargo +nightly fmt` and fix errors after recovery_engine deletion
Run `cargo clippy --workspace --all-targets --all-features -- -D warnings`
Fix all clippy issues following WarningRules
Run `cargo nextest run`
STOP if test failures - review with user
Subagent: STOP and return control
Main: Task new subagent for code review (read-only)
Review suggestions with user
